alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 05 at 5:04PM MST until November 06 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MST MONDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229 and 230. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. The strongest winds will likely occur on Tuesday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
